main event: Visual sighting of a bright, white light at high altitude maneuver in a lateral direction and then disappear on April 8, 1961.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 2 minutes.,The object was reported at a high altitude.,The light was described as bright and white.,The maneuvering of the object was lateral.,The report suggested that the sighting may resemble a characteristic meteor.
sighted object: a bright, white light in the sky
